title: Interview: Savages
body:
As Savages continue to develop a sterling reputation for their live performances, it won’t be long until they finally release some recorded material for all of us to marvel over.

In the meanwhile you can listen to an interview I did wit the band prior to their Manchester show, and watch a video of that very same performance.
